name: Knight's Quest (Avik Shenoy)
description:
Knight's Quest is a game where you play as a knight on a quest to save the princess from the castle! 

Knight's Quest is the first game I've ever created from scratch. Knight's Quest was originally a game jam game but I spent an extra few weeks to add more features. About 80% of the game was created in just one week, including creating the assets, animations, and core gameplay. The game was developed in Unreal Engine and all the assets and animations were created in Blender. 

Game developed by Avik Shenoy
Game menu artwork by Carter Roodman
Music: https://www.bensound.com
